quote: The days are long, but the years are short.
author: Gretchen Rubin

quote: There is no way to be a perfect parent, and a million ways to be a good one.
author: Jill Churchill

quote: Parenthood: the scariest hood you'll ever go through.
author: Unknown

quote: Children are not a distraction from more important work. They are the most important work.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Your greatest contribution to the universe may not be something you do, but someone you raise.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: It’s not only children who grow. Parents do too.
author: Joyce Maynard

quote: A child needs your love most when they deserve it the least.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Behind every young child who believes in themselves is a parent who believed first.
author: Matthew Jacobson

quote: Love is the chain whereby to bind a child to its parents.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Being a parent means loving your children more than you've ever loved yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: The most precious jewels you’ll ever have around your neck are the arms of your children.
author: Unknown

quote: To be in your children's memories tomorrow, you have to be in their lives today.
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: Children learn more from what you are than what you teach.
author: W.E.B. Du Bois

quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Even when freshly washed and relieved of all obvious confections, children tend to be sticky.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches, but the spirit of reverence.
author: Plato

quote: The best way to make children good is to make them happy.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don’t worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: A baby fills a place in your heart you never knew was empty.
author: Unknown
